Title: Relates to public access to records of ethical or disciplinary proceedings of state agency commissioners, elected officials, members of the legislature and employees of certain not-for-profits
Summary: Permits public access to records of ethical or disciplinary proceedings regarding state agency commissioners, elected officials, members of the legislature and employees of certain not-for-profits which receive state funding.
LawCode: Add §§89-a & 89-b, Pub Off L; amd §80, Leg L; amd §94, Exec L; amd §3-104, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, the legislative law, the executive law and the election law, in relation to public access to records of certain disciplinary proceedings
